author: tangymanchurian
content:
I need some clarification regarding the statement below as found in Aditya's blog post https://notes.ethereum.org/@adiasg/weak-subjectvity-eth2#

```* Exiting the same validator from V0 in both V1 and V2 is not optimal since it wastes one spot in the validator exit and doesn’t contribute to the objective. So, E1 ∩ E2 = {}.
* Similarly, activating the same validator activate in both V1 and V2 is not optimal. So, A1 ∩ A2 = {}.```

If anyone understands why the activations are mutually exclusive, please hint. Same for exits.
